title: Input lag in-game
body:
So I have a problem where whenever I play a game it starts out perfectly but then 1 minute into the game my keyboard just lags like crazy and I thought it was packet loss but I cant even alt tab out of the game and then I have to try play the game using only the mouse, I have tried repairing the client but it still doesn't work properly and what confuses me the most is that the whole computer just lags like crazy when the game starts but only with the keyboard, mouse works perfectly well. ping and fps are also good. help with this would be highly appreciated
Thank you

replies.body: Do you have Discord installed by chance?  Players have had similar issues due to having Discord Overlays active.  Disabling it may help, but test it in a custom first.
